text: 8|19|Yadi tomara mimansa ceye thaka, tahale ta to tomadera kache eseche; ara yadi tomara birata ha'o tabe ta tomadera jan'ya kalyanakara, kintu yadi tomara abara yud'dha karate asa tabe amara'o abara sasti niye asaba. Ara tomadera dala sankhyaya besi hale'o tomadera kono kaje asabe na. Ara niscaya allaha muminadera sathe achena [1].
